title: Textile, 1967
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 192 x 83 cm (6 ft. 3 9/16 in. x 32 11/16 in.)
description: One of a group of fabrics representing the Silver Jubilee of King George and Queen Mary of England in 1935. Diagonal bands of butterfies and repeat of the words "LABALABA TO BA DIGBOLEGUN", in pale and dark blue on a green ground. Aonther pattern in dark blue is superimposed over this, with a central medallion with two crowned heads and an all-over pattern of leaves. A band at the bottom bears the inscription "IREGBOGBOKO NSEYINMI. S.A.1967" above alternating squares with two birds or closely space dots.
